item.title: How do you spawn objects client sided 317
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

I dont mean server sided like most people do because it has that lag, i mean like so the object loads with the rest of the map through the cache.

Not landscapes ive used map editors before but i mean like adding a wall on thr clientside so that minimap will show a white line for a wall or like if i made a custom tree the minimap would show a tree, ya know what i mean? So that the object loads with the rest of the map
